GeneticAlgorithm algorithm

Detailed Description

The Runner is the abstraction of an execution enviroinment per Jenes. By now this approach has been used to parallelize the fitness evaluation step. The programmer have to override the default call-backs than use execute(jenes.GeneticAlgorithm) or execute(jenes.GeneticAlgorithm, boolean) to activate Genetic Algorithm to start evolving in the enviroinment.

Since:
2.0

Parameters:

void jenes.utils.multitasking.Runner.onEvaluationEnd (  ) 

Call-back invoked soon after the evaluation phase has been performed.
WARNING: the method is called before the elapsed time per evaluation is computed so a huge work could affect measurements.

Reimplemented in jenes.utils.multitasking.MultiThreadEvaluator.
